on reading compounds: 輪【リン】counter for wheels and flowers
輪郭【リンカク】contour, outline, border, silhouette, summary, outline, sketch, looks, features, appearance
競輪【ケイリン】keirin, cycle racing event, usu. 2km with a paced start and sprint finish
kun reading compounds: 輪【わ】ring, circle, loop, hoop, wheel, circle (e.g. of friends)
埴輪【はにわ】haniwa, hollow unglazed terracotta figure from the Kofun period
後輪【こうりん】rear wheel, cantle
